tool_description: Generate cold opening lines from social media posts
name: Cold Opener
title: Cold Opener

api_list.name: Cold line from Instagram post
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cold-opener.p.rapidapi.com/getline"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cold-opener.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cold-opener.p.rapidapi.com/getline"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cold-opener.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
